# The `CSEMIRBuilder.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements a version of MachineIRBuilder which CSEs insts within a MachineBasicBlock. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file implements a version of MachineIRBuilder which CSEs insts within a MachineBasicBlock.

<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns true if A dominates B (within the same basic block).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Both iterators must be in the same basic block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// approach is better? Should this even change dynamically? For G&#95;CONSTANTS</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// most of which will be at the top of the BB, the top down approach would be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
